channel.title: SAS Old School (with a twist) | NPC clipping | Dragon slayer | Unique
channel.description:
All the information is in the thread basically, i stopped doing it so why not release
Client -http://uppit.com/kq1wk0igvdxz/Client.rar Server -http://uppit.com/ypu2hzy55h1m/Server.rar Cache - https://dl.dropbox.com/u/68949430/sascache.zip [img]http://i.imgur.com/8TrHF.png[/img]
hello and welcome to me thread/ Project. I am making this in the spare time i have basically to waste time , It will be a old school server set about 2005/2006. It will not have any custom items but will have allot of custom features. if you would like to join the developement team just send me a pm, currently it is just me working on the project , note that you must have a decent java knowledge and you must speak English, You must be not be a new member of rune|server and have to be slightly trusted. So anyway less of me explainig and i will give you the features so i hope you enjoy it, remember to hit the "thanks" button :P, note that i will keep on updating this thread.
Bug fixes Lottery wouldent auto withdraw When clickin spell then on npc , you do the spell and run to them Npc's wouldnt walk to you when you are diagonal from object's Fixed a few npc's animations when drop dharoks it resets your timer to 0 Dharok's axe disapears when turns to "0" Degrading messages thx to Eliminate All barrows items turn to "0" when dropped when dharok's axe 25 vanishes you still have bonuses Dharok's axe animation's Dharok's axe levels required Dharok's axe speed
Update log Mass Reconstruction on firemaking Added Lottery System withdraws when more than 1 person enters Added birdnests Added random event tree spirit Rewrote Item Requirments system Rewrote some combat Flawless Switching Added woodcutting System Double door system and single doors Can pick xp rates on start Degrading System
Skills & Combat
Melee Player vs Player defence system |||||||||| Player vs Player max hit system |||||||||| Player vs Player Accrucy |||||||||| Player vs NPC Accrucy |||||||||| Player vs NPC Max Hit |||||||||| Player vs NPC Defence |||||||||
Range Player vs Player max hit system |||||||||| Player vs Player defence system |||||||||| Correct Levels required |||||||||| Correct arrows with bow's |||||||||| Distance shooting |||||||||| Clipped Attacking |||||||||| Correct speeds ||||||||||
Magic Correct Max hit System |||||||||| Ancient spell book |||||||||| Modern spell book |||||||||| Correct gfx's |||||||||| Correct Animation's |||||||||| Clipped Attacking ||||||||||
Prayer Correct Levels Required |||||||||| Correct drainage |||||||||| Correct xp from bones |||||||||| All bones buryable |||||||||| Correct Head icons ||||||||||
Woodcutting Tree's turn to stump's |||||||||| Correct Delay's |||||||||| Level's Required |||||||||| All tree's Cutable |||||||||| Birdnests |||||||||| Random Event - Tree Spirit ||||||||||
Firemaking Correct delay's |||||||||| Clipped |||||||||| Fire's turn to ashes |||||||||| Correct requirements |||||||||| Can light on fires ||||||||||
Mining Correct delay's |||||||||| Correct Animation's |||||||||| Correct Requirement's |||||||||| Rocks Disapear |||||||||| Random event - Rock golem |||||||||| Gem's ||||||||||
Mining Smithing ore's |||||||||| Correct Requirement's |||||||||| Smithing bar's ||||||||||
Misc Lottery System |||||||||| Stairs |||||||||| Ladders |||||||||| Global shops |||||||||| Global spawn's |||||||||| Can Choose Xp rates on login |||||||||| Clipped NPC's |||||||||| Clipped NPC Attacking |||||||||| Clipped player's |||||||||| Clipped player Attacking |||||||||| Single Doors |||||||||| Double doors |||||||||| Dharok's Degrading ||||||||||
Quests Dragon Slayer (my own version) |||||||||| Cook's Assistant |||||||||| Doric's Quest |||||||||| Demon Slayer |||||||||| Black knight's fortress |||||||||| Prince Ali's Rescue ||||||||||
Media [img]http://i.imgur.com/3j86Q.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mjxF0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tNhMP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZE3Dy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7MnQz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LUTrq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uAiih.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Yk1Q9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vvGlE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u19cw.png[/img]
Quest Media Dragon Slayer Note that there is allot of dialogue that goes with this, i just printed the main parts and this is my own version of it so don't complain [img]http://i.imgur.com/EsBav.jpg[/img]
I DO NOT GIVE PERMISSION TO RELEASE ANYWHERE ELSE! If you use give proper credits If this gets a lot of downloads and no comments then i will remove this
Going by the source downloads. 10 Downloads [x] 20 Downloads [x] 50 Downloads [x] 75 Downloads [x] 100 Downloads [x] 150 Downloads [x] 200 Downloads [x] 300 Downloads [x] 500 Downloads [] 500 + Downloads []

item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Having topic titles involving "About to remove" , "Post or ill remove", or something similar will result in a lock and a warn/mute. Refer to this topic for complete details.
I suggest you get rid of "[i]If this gets a lot of downloads and no comments then i will remove this[/i]."

Thanks for contributing.

Read full topic

item.title: SAS Old School (with a twist) | NPC clipping | Dragon slayer | Unique
item.dc:creator: @Ineed2BeGood Ineed2BeGood
item.description:
@Ineed2BeGood wrote:

All the information is in the thread basically, i stopped doing it so why not release

Client -http://uppit.com/kq1wk0igvdxz/Client.rar
Server -http://uppit.com/ypu2hzy55h1m/Server.rar
Cache - https://dl.dropbox.com/u/68949430/sascache.zip

hello and welcome to me thread/ Project. I am making this in the spare time i have basically to waste time , It will be a old school server set about 2005/2006. It will not have any custom items but will have allot of custom features. if you would like to join the developement team just send me a pm, currently it is just me working on the project , note that you must have a decent java knowledge and you must speak English, You must be not be a new member of rune|server and have to be slightly trusted. So anyway less of me explainig and i will give you the features so i hope you enjoy it, remember to hit the “thanks” button :P, note that i will keep on updating this thread.

Bug fixes
Lottery wouldent auto withdraw
When clickin spell then on npc , you do the spell and run to them
Npc’s wouldnt walk to you when you are diagonal from object’s
Fixed a few npc’s animations
when drop dharoks it resets your timer to 0
Dharok’s axe disapears when turns to “0”
Degrading messages thx to Eliminate
All barrows items turn to “0” when dropped
when dharok’s axe 25 vanishes you still have bonuses
Dharok’s axe animation’s
Dharok’s axe levels required
Dharok’s axe speed

Update log
Mass Reconstruction on firemaking
Added Lottery System withdraws when more than 1 person enters
Added birdnests
Added random event tree spirit
Rewrote Item Requirments system
Rewrote some combat
Flawless Switching
Added woodcutting System
Double door system and single doors
Can pick xp rates on start
Degrading System
